{{html:
<form class="form-horizontal">
  <fieldset>
    <div id="legend" class="">
      <legend class="">Starting, restarting and shutdown</legend>
    </div>

    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label" for="input01">Start time</label>
      <div class="controls">
        <input type="text" placeholder="yy-mm-dd hh:mm" class="input-xlarge" value="$$startdatetime">
        <p class="help-block"></p>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label">Comments</label>
      <div class="controls">
        <div class="textarea">
          <textarea type="" class="">$$startcomment</textarea>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="control-group">
      <div class="controls">
        <button class="btn btn-success" value="start">Start</button>
        <button class="btn btn-success" value="restart">Restart</button>
        <button class="btn btn-success" value="stop">Stop</button>
      </div>
    </div>
  </fieldset>
</form>
}}
